data.eml:eml: Is Elsiella Froeschner, 1981 a valid genus? (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Pentatominae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Simões, Felipe Lorenz, Ferrari, Augusto, Grazia, Jocélia (2012): Is Elsiella Froeschner, 1981 a valid genus? (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomidae: Pentatominae). Zootaxa 3238: 39-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211530
